title: Type Trading Cards (fonts.com)
content:
Was surfing around for 'typographic playing cards' when I chanced upon [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017104740/http:/www.fonts.com/AboutFonts/Articles/TypeTradingCards/index.htm), looks pretty cool.

Anyone know of any other similar resources?

I think it would be pretty fun if foundries released specimens in this format.
author: jabez

comments.content:
Interesting concept, but their designs don't have much visual impact. It might be cool to explore the possibilities.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[_...from the Fontry_](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017104740/http:/www.thefontry.com/)
